languages.text: Ксенос, называющая себя Тазарра и действующая от имени архонта Иремерисс, устроила на мире-тюрьме арену для развлечения сородичей. Рекомендуется устранение врагов Империума, включая также предателей из сонма Человечества.

A xenos by the name of Tazarra acting on behalf of Archon Yremeryss has created an arena on a penal world to entertain her kin. The enemies of the Imperium must be destroyed, including the traitors from the hordes of Humanity.
languages.original_text: Ксенос, называющая себя Тазарра и действующая от имени архонта Иремерисс, устроила на мире-тюрьме арену для развлечения сородичей. Рекомендуется устранение врагов Империума, включая также предателей из сонма Человечества.

traits.locale_text: A xenos by the name of Tarazza acting on behalf of Archon Yremeriss Aezyrraesh has created an arena on a penal world to entertain her kin. The enemies of the Imperium must be destroyed, including the traitors from the hordes of Humanity.

A xenos by the name of Tarazza acting on behalf of Archon Yremeriss Aezyrraesh has created an arena on a penal world to entertain her kin. The enemies of the Imperium must be destroyed, including the traitors from the hordes of Humanity.

A xenos by the name of Tarazza acting on behalf of Archon Yremeriss Aezyrraesh has created an arena on a penal world to entertain her kin. The enemies of the Imperium must be destroyed, including the traitors from the hordes of Humanity.

A xenos by the name of Tazarra acting on behalf of Archon Yremeryss has created an arena on a penal world to entertain her kin. The enemies of the Imperium must be destroyed, including the traitors from the hordes of Humanity.

languages.text: 一位名叫塔扎菈的异形以伊芮梅莉斯执政官的名义，在刑罚世界上建起了一座竞技场，招待她的亲族。帝国之敌必须消灭，那些背叛了人类的叛徒也必须得到惩罚。
languages.original_text: A xenos by the name of Tazarra acting on behalf of Archon Yremeryss has created an arena on a penal world to entertain her kin. The enemies of the Imperium must be destroyed, including the traitors from the hordes of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: 一位名叫塔扎菈的异形以伊芮梅莉斯·艾泽拉什执政官的名义，在刑罚世界上建起了一座竞技场，招待她的亲族。帝国之敌必须消灭，那些背叛了人类的叛徒也必须得到惩罚。

languages.text: アーコン・イレメリスの代理を務めるタザーラという名の異種族が、仲間を楽しませるために流刑惑星に闘技場を創設した。人類群の裏切り者を含め、帝国の敵は滅ぼされなければならない。
languages.original_text: A xenos by the name of Tazarra acting on behalf of Archon Yremeryss has created an arena on a penal world to entertain her kin. The enemies of the Imperium must be destroyed, including the traitors from the hordes of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: アーコン・イレメリスの代理を務めるタザーラという名の異種族が、仲間を楽しませるために流刑惑星に闘技場を創設した。人類群の裏切り者を含め、帝国の敵は滅ぼされなければならない。

languages.text: Una xenos llamada Tazarra que actúa por orden de la Arconte Yremeryss ha creado un coliseo en un mundo penal para entretener a los suyos. Los enemigos del Imperium deben morir, incluyendo a los traidores entre las hordas de la Humanidad.
languages.original_text: A xenos by the name of Tazarra acting on behalf of Archon Yremeryss has created an arena on a penal world to entertain her kin. The enemies of the Imperium must be destroyed, including the traitors from the hordes of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Una xenos llamada Tarazza que actúa por orden de la Arconte Yremeryss Aezyrraesh ha creado un coliseo en un mundo penal para entretener a los suyos. Los enemigos del Imperium deben morir, incluyendo a los traidores entre las hordas de la Humanidad.

languages.text: Eine Xenos namens Tazarra, die im Auftrag von Archon Yremeryss handelt, hat auf einer Strafwelt eine Arena zur Unterhaltung ihrer Sippe geschaffen. Die Feinde des Imperiums müssen vernichtet werden, einschließlich aller Verräter der Horden der Menschheit.
languages.original_text: A xenos by the name of Tazarra acting on behalf of Archon Yremeryss has created an arena on a penal world to entertain her kin. The enemies of the Imperium must be destroyed, including the traitors from the hordes of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Eine Xenos namens Tarazza, die im Auftrag von Archon Yremeryss Aezyrraesh handelt, hat auf der Strafwelt eine Arena zur Unterhaltung ihrer Sippe geschaffen. Die Feinde des Imperiums müssen vernichtet werden, einschließlich aller Verräter der Horden der Menschheit.

languages.text: Une xénos du nom de Tazarra aux ordres de l'Archonte Yremeryss a bâti une arène sur un monde pénal pour divertir les siens. Les ennemis de l'Imperium doivent être éliminés, y compris les traîtres issus des rangs de l'humanité.
languages.original_text: A xenos by the name of Tazarra acting on behalf of Archon Yremeryss has created an arena on a penal world to entertain her kin. The enemies of the Imperium must be destroyed, including the traitors from the hordes of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Une xénos du nom de Tarazza aux ordres de l'Archonte Yremeryss Aezyrraesh a bâti une arène sur un monde pénal pour divertir les siens. Les ennemis de l'Imperium doivent être éliminés, y compris les traîtres issus des rangs de l'humanité.

languages.text: Arkon Yremeryss adına faaliyet gösteren Tazarra adındaki bir zeno, ceza dünyasında türdeşlerini eğlendirmek için bir arena kurmuş. İnsanlığa ihanet edenler de dâhil İmparatorluk'un tüm düşmanları yok edilmeli.
languages.original_text: A xenos by the name of Tazarra acting on behalf of Archon Yremeryss has created an arena on a penal world to entertain her kin. The enemies of the Imperium must be destroyed, including the traitors from the hordes of Humanity.

traits.locale_text: Archon Yremeryss adına faaliyet gösteren Tazarra adındaki bir zeno, ceza dünyasında türünün eğlencesi için bir arena kurmuş. İmparatorluk'un düşmanları yok edilmeli. Bunlara hain insan güruhları da dâhil.
